Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Exempts certain ministerial communications of school districts from the freedom of information law
Summary: Exempts certain ministerial communications of school districts from the freedom of information law.
LawCode: Amd ยง87, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to exempting certain ministerial communications of school districts from the freedom of information law
